jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
We’re looking for product researchers who are passionate about getting inspiration from people, and able to translate the insights into actionable recommendations that can help the product team to deliver a more meaningful experience to our users.

You will be an integral part of the product team, where you play an active role in delivering the user's voice into the product pipeline. Product Researchers help bring the culture of research in the way we design products by providing an in-depth understanding of user's behavior.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Has an educational degree of some kind - we’re quite chill with this
  • Has 3+ years of proven experience in conducting human-centered design research, UX research, synthesis and workshop facilitation
  • Has experience drawing from a variety of research methods: in-depth interviews, ethnographic, surveys, prototyping, diary studies
  • Has the ability to see patterns and behavior through numbers. You will be working closely with our BI team, so you need to feel comfortable with number crunching
  • Experience drawing from a variety of synthesis methods: user journey, experience map, personas, value proposition analysis, and other framework of analysis
  • Is passionate about social impact and how technology can improve people’s lives
  • Has professional fluency in Bahasa Indonesia and English

• Work closely with Product Managers, Designers, Engineer, and Analysts to ensure that your research aligns with the project vision and objectives
  • Plan, design, execute and manage experience research projects that can span from “up the funnel” foundational research, mapping service experience, to concept and usability testing
  • Synthesizing research findings into robust and inspiring recommendations, utilizing both qualitative and quantitative data
  • Facilitate inspiration workshop where you guide stakeholders to come up with ideas that are based from the insights you have gathered
